speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Jack Rugby.

speaker: RUGBY
text: Sir?

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Vat is the clock, Jack?

speaker: RUGBY
text: ’Tis past the hour, sir, that Sir Hugh promised

speaker: RUGBY
text: to meet.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, he has save his soul dat he is no

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: come. He has pray his Pible well dat he is no come.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, Jack Rugby, he is dead already if he be

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: come.

speaker: RUGBY
text: He is wise, sir. He knew your Worship would

speaker: RUGBY
text: kill him if he came.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, de herring is no dead so as I vill

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: kill him. Take your rapier, Jack. I vill tell you how I

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: vill kill him.

speaker: RUGBY
text: Alas, sir, I cannot fence.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Villainy, take your rapier.

speaker: RUGBY
text: Forbear. Here’s company.

speaker: HOST
text: God bless thee, bully doctor!

speaker: SHALLOW
text: God save you, Master Doctor Caius!

speaker: PAGE
text: Now, good Master Doctor!

speaker: SLENDER
text: Give you good morrow, sir.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Vat be all you, one, two, tree, four, come

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: for?

speaker: HOST
text: To see thee fight, to see thee foin, to see thee traverse;

speaker: HOST
text: to see thee here, to see thee there; to see

speaker: HOST
text: thy pass, thy puncto, thy stock, thy reverse, thy

speaker: HOST
text: distance, thy montant. Is he dead, my Ethiopian?

speaker: HOST
text: Is he dead, my Francisco? Ha, bully? What says

speaker: HOST
text: my Aesculapius, my Galien, my heart of elder, ha?

speaker: HOST
text: Is he dead, bully stale? Is he dead?

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, he is de coward jack-priest of de

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: vorld. He is not show his face.

speaker: HOST
text: Thou art a Castalion King Urinal Hector of

speaker: HOST
text: Greece, my boy!

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: I pray you, bear witness that me have

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: stay six or seven, two, tree hours for him, and he is

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: no come.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: He is the wiser man, Master Doctor. He is a

speaker: SHALLOW
text: curer of souls, and you a curer of bodies. If you

speaker: SHALLOW
text: should fight, you go against the hair of your professions.—

speaker: SHALLOW
text: Is it not true, Master Page?

speaker: PAGE
text: Master Shallow, you have yourself been a great

speaker: PAGE
text: fighter, though now a man of peace.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: Bodykins, Master Page, though I now be old

speaker: SHALLOW
text: and of the peace, if I see a sword out, my finger

speaker: SHALLOW
text: itches to make one. Though we are justices and

speaker: SHALLOW
text: doctors and churchmen, Master Page, we have

speaker: SHALLOW
text: some salt of our youth in us. We are the sons of

speaker: SHALLOW
text: women, Master Page.

speaker: PAGE
text: ’Tis true, Master Shallow.

speaker: SHALLOW
text: It will be found so, Master Page.—Master

speaker: SHALLOW
text: Doctor Caius, I am come to fetch you home. I am

speaker: SHALLOW
text: sworn of the peace. You have showed yourself a

speaker: SHALLOW
text: wise physician, and Sir Hugh hath shown himself

speaker: SHALLOW
text: a wise and patient churchman. You must go with

speaker: SHALLOW
text: me, Master Doctor.

speaker: HOST
text:
Pardon, guest Justice.
                 
                (
                To
                 
                Caius
                .
                )
               A word,

speaker: HOST
text: Monsieur Mockwater.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: “Mockvater”? Vat is dat?

speaker: HOST
text: “Mockwater,” in our English tongue, is “valor,”

speaker: HOST
text: bully.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, then I have as much mockvater

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: as de Englishman. Scurvy jack-dog priest! By gar,

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: me vill cut his ears.

speaker: HOST
text: He will clapper-claw thee tightly, bully.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: “Clapper-de-claw”? Vat is dat?

speaker: HOST
text: That is, he will make thee amends.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, me do look he shall clapper-de-claw

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: me, for, by gar, me vill have it.

speaker: HOST
text: And I will provoke him to ’t, or let him wag.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Me tank you for dat.

speaker: HOST
text: And moreover, bully—

speaker: HOST
text: But first, Master guest, and

speaker: HOST
text: Master Page, and eke Cavaleiro Slender, go you

speaker: HOST
text: through the town to Frogmore.

speaker: PAGE
text: Sir Hugh is there, is he?

speaker: HOST
text: He is there. See what humor he is in; and I will

speaker: HOST
text: bring the doctor about by the fields. Will it do

speaker: HOST
text: well?

speaker: SHALLOW
text: We will do it.

speaker:
PAGE
              ,
               
              SHALLOW
              ,
               
              and
               
              SLENDER
text: Adieu, good Master

speaker:
PAGE
              ,
               
              SHALLOW
              ,
               
              and
               
              SLENDER
text: Doctor.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, me vill kill de priest, for he speak

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: for a jackanape to Anne Page.

speaker: HOST
text: Let him die. Sheathe thy impatience; throw cold

speaker: HOST
text: water on thy choler. Go about the fields with me

speaker: HOST
text: through Frogmore. I will bring thee where Mistress

speaker: HOST
text: Anne Page is, at a farmhouse a-feasting, and

speaker: HOST
text: thou shalt woo her. Cried game! Said I well?

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, me dank you vor dat. By gar, I

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: love you, and I shall procure-a you de good guest:

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: de earl, de knight, de lords, de gentlemen, my

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: patients.

speaker: HOST
text: For the which I will be thy adversary toward

speaker: HOST
text: Anne Page. Said I well?

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: By gar, ’tis good. Vell said.

speaker: HOST
text: Let us wag, then.

speaker:
DOCTOR
               
              CAIUS
text: Come at my heels, Jack Rugby.
